page.title: 03ALLENDALE COUNTRY WALK
page.content: { Oakpool and East Allen { {Distance : 7 miles {*(or 4.5 miles as indicated) {Ordinance Survey Sheet NY85 1:25000 { {IF WALKING} Leave from {Allendale Post Office}and walk down the Peth Bank,turning right at the footpath signpost halfway down the bank. 1.Follow the east bank of the river { {East Allen} fot 0.5 miles to where the footpath bears sharp left,just before reaching the main road.On the opposite bank of the river through the trees you will see the old lead smelting mill,now a haulage depot,where the ore from the Dale was smelted over a period of two hundred years.The mill finally closeddown in 1897.
